prompt: <description>Part 1 Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and meet at right angles. The dimensions of the sides are equal. 1. Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.75, 0.0] 2. Draw a 2D sketch on the XY plane of the newly created coordinate system. 3. Within the sketch, create a rectangular face (face_1) with the following loops and lines: * loop_1 + line_1: [0.0, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.0] + line_2: [0.75, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.75] + line_3: [0.75, 0.75] to [0.0, 0.75] + line_4: [0.0, 0.75] to [0.0, 0.0] 4. Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. 5. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D by rotating it according to the defined Euler angles and translating it using the translation vector. 6. Extrude the 2D sketch along the positive Z-axis by 0.75 units. Part 2 Create a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The dimensions of the sides are equal, and the height is half the width. 1. Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.4342] 2. Draw a 2D sketch on the XY plane of the newly created coordinate system. 3. Within the sketch, create a rectangular face (face_1) with the following loops and lines: * loop_1 + line_1: [0.0, 0.0] to [0.375, 0.0] + line_2: [0.375, 0.0] to [0.375, 0.3158] + line_3: [0.375, 0.3158] to [0.0, 0.3158] + line_4: [0.0, 0.3158] to [0.0, 0.0] 4. Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.375. 5. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D by rotating it according to the defined Euler angles and translating it using the translation vector. 6. Subtractively extrude the 2D sketch along the negative Z-axis by 0.375 units. > The final shape is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. The sides are parallel and meet at right angles, and the top and bottom faces are tapered with equal dimensions.</description>
